name: Blaze Kick
flavor_text: The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit more easily. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Flare Blitz
flavor_text: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack may leave the target with a burn.

name: Sunny Day
flavor_text: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves. It lowers the power of Water-type moves.
